name: surface_radioactivity_content_of_79Se
description: The surface called "surface" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere. "Content" indicates a quantity per unit area. "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "Se" means the element "selenium" and "79Se" is the isotope "selenium-79" with a half-life of 2.37e+07 days.
